example_sentence_english: I have a chair in the kitchen.
Ancient chairs furnish the living room.
The chairs are in the room.

example_sentence_italian: Ci sono delle sedie nel magazzino.
example_sentence_english: There are some chairs in the warehouse.

example_sentence_italian: Il colore della sedia è rosso.
example_sentence_english: The color of the chair is red.
I put the cushion on the chair.
I bring the cushions to the chairs.

example_sentence_italian: Ho tolto le briciole dalla sedia.
example_sentence_english: I removed the crumbs from the chair.

example_sentence_italian: Ho tolto le briciole dalle sedie.
example_sentence_english: I removed the crumbs from the chairs.
The kitten is in the chair.
They are seated in the chairs.
I put the book on the chair.
The books are on the chairs.

example_sentence_italian: Sposto il tavolo con la sedia.
example_sentence_english: I move the table with the chair.

example_sentence_italian: Abbiamo sistemato la stanza con le sedie.
example_sentence_english: We set up the room with the chairs.

notes: not used with feminine nouns; use 'con la'
example_sentence_italian: 'Col sedia' è scorretto; si dice 'con la sedia'.
example_sentence_english: 'Col sedia' is incorrect; say 'con la sedia'.

notes: not used with feminine nouns; use 'con le'
example_sentence_italian: 'Coi sedie' è scorretto; si dice 'con le sedie'.
example_sentence_english: 'Coi sedie' is incorrect; say 'con le sedie'.
